title: Les Roches
description: This project required coordination with a designer for the refresh of the homepage, as well as the about page. This site was originally built using Wordpress so I had to quickly learn and adapt to develop PHP and build an easy to understand and use CMS interface for the client.

title: Emoti
description: Utilising TypeScript, I developed a new UI library and helped transition from purely JavaScript with struggling API calls and type safety, to a safe and more robust application with the ability to scale.

title: Kings Heath Yoga
description: This project required deep support for mobile users, as the target audience was found to primarily use mobiles day-to-day for browsing. This meant creating a responsive webpage with accessibility features to support this.
testimonial: "I didn't have a clear vision of the site or the name or the logo, but Sam gave me options which enabled me to choose without being overwhelmed"
